definitions.definition: A brief recreational trip ; a journey out of the usual way.
examples: While driving home I took an excursion and saw some deer.

definitions.definition: A wandering from the main subject: a digression .
An occurrence where an aircraft runs off the end or side of a runway or taxiway , usually during takeoff , landing , or taxi .
A deviation in pitch , for example in the syllables of enthusiastic speech .

main_definition: A brief recreational trip ; a journey out of the usual way.
secondary_definitions: A wandering from the main subject: a digression .
( aviation ) An occurrence where an aircraft runs off the end or side of a runway or taxiway , usually during takeoff , landing , or taxi .
( phonetics ) A deviation in pitch , for example in the syllables of enthusiastic speech .
